title: Git
description: Git is a distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code.

snippets.Basic Commands:
# Initialize repo
git init

# Clone repo
git clone url

# Check status
git status

# View history
git log
git log --oneline

# Show changes
git diff
snippets.Staging & Committing:
# Stage files
git add .
git add filename

# Commit
git commit -m "message"

# Commit all changes
git commit -am "message"

# Amend last commit
git commit --amend
snippets.Branching:
# List branches
git branch

# Create branch
git branch branch-name

# Switch branch
git checkout branch-name
git switch branch-name

# Create and switch
git checkout -b branch-name

# Delete branch
git branch -d branch-name
snippets.Merging:
# Merge branch
git merge branch-name

# Abort merge
git merge --abort

# Rebase
git rebase branch-name

# Interactive rebase
git rebase -i HEAD~3
snippets.Remote:
# Add remote
git remote add origin url

# View remotes
git remote -v

# Push
git push
git push -u origin main

# Pull
git pull
git pull origin main

# Fetch
git fetch
snippets.Undoing Changes:
# Discard changes
git checkout -- filename
git restore filename

# Unstage
git reset HEAD filename
git restore --staged filename

# Reset commit
git reset --soft HEAD~1
git reset --hard HEAD~1
snippets.Stashing:
# Stash changes
git stash
git stash save "message"

# List stashes
git stash list

# Apply stash
git stash apply
git stash pop

# Drop stash
git stash drop
snippets.Tags:
# Create tag
git tag v1.0.0
git tag -a v1.0.0 -m "Version 1.0"

# List tags
git tag

# Push tags
git push --tags

# Delete tag
git tag -d v1.0.0
